block.p: FINKELSTEIN-Aaron. On June 7, 2000. Devoted husband of Harriet, loving father of Larry and David and Christine. Proud grandfather of Eric, Gregory, Sandy, Abby and Johnathon. Beloved brother-in-law of Jean Finkelstein, Dorothy Millman Dr. Alex and Vi Ellman and Esther and George Edwards. Uncle,Great uncle and friend of many. Services West End Temple,147-02 Newport Ave Neponsit, NY Thurs, June 8, at 11am.
